column1: The pages relating to the Tame Valley Partnership are currently being revised. The SRB6 funded "Linking Life Chances and Brownfield Development" continues until March 2007. The SRB5 funded "New Opportunities for Communities Under Threat" ended in March 2005. However Community Regeneration activities continue in Denton South, Smallshaw/Hurst, Newton, Ridgehill and Droylsden East.
In the meantime if you require and information relating to Community Regeneration in the above areas, or Brownfield Site activities throughout the Borough, please ring 0161 342 3584.
General enquiries relating to business development, property, European funding, lottery grants, etc., can be directed to the Economic Development Unit.
Still not found what you are looking for? Try our Search or our A to Z of Services:
